title: Foxworth Friday: Stay true to yourself like Anthony Edwards, also USC noise disrespects Tomlin
description:
Bomani Jones and Domonique Foxworth discuss Timberwolves G Anthony Edwards staying true to himself like former Seahawks great Marshawn Lynch (1:38). Plus, interracial weddings and recognizing music across cultural lines (17:11), as well as why Steelers coach Mike Tomlin being connected to the USC job is disrespectful (30:55).
